Text:
It looks like SafeNet/MediaDefender/MediaSentry or whoever is trying to hijack this torrent with fake seeders. I've enabled PeerGuardian on my end to prevent seeding to them, but they are also sending bad data to the leechers, so it's not working well.

Appears to be coming from mostly 38.100.26.2xx.

I thought the admins banned this IP block already?
